properties.Title: Pitcher in the Form of a Hippopotamus
properties.Description:
Pitcher in the form of a hippopotamus
Nubian, 1700-1550 BCE
Terracotta
Height: 20.5 cm (8 1/16 in.); length: 26.5 cm (10 7/16 in.)
From Tomb K 330 in the South Cemetery at Kerma (Sudan)
Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, Harvard University-Boston Museum of Fine Arts Expedition, 21.11804
© 2018 Museum of Fine Arts, Boston

properties.Title: Lion BIBRÛ
properties.Description:
Lion BIBRÛ
Anatolian, Old Assyrian Trading Colony Period, early 2nd millennium BCE
Painted terracotta
Height: 20.5 cm (8 1/16 in.); length: 21.5 cm (8 7/16 in.)
From Kanesh (Kültepe, Turkey)
Musée du Louvre, Paris, AM 1517
Erich Lessing/Art Resource, NY

properties.Title: Bull Head Rhyton
properties.Description:
Bull head rhyton
Minoan (Late Minoan IIIA:2), 14th¬-13th century BCE
Painted terracotta
Height: 18.8 cm (6 5/8 in.); length: 16.4 cm (6 7/16 in.)
From Karpathos (Greece)
The British Museum, London, Donated by W. R. Paton, 1887,0501.6 (A871)
© The Trustees of the British Museum. All rights reserved

properties.Title: Ram Head Rhyton
properties.Description:
Ram head rhyton
Mycenaean (Late Helladic A:2), 14th-13th century BCE
Painted terracotta
Height: 21.5 cm (8 7/16 in.); diameter: 16 cm (6 5/16 in.)
From Ras Shamra-Ugarit (Minet el-Beida, Syria)
Musée du Louvre, Paris, AO 19932
Erich Lessing/Art Resource, NY

properties.Title: Bull Rhyton
properties.Description:
Bull rhyton
Cypriot, 14th-13th century BCE
Painted terracotta, Base Ring Ware
Height: 20.3 cm (8 in.); length: 24 cm (9 7/16 in.)
From Tomb 15 at Maroni (Cyprus)
The British Museum, London, Excavated by the British Museum, 1898,1201.142 (A45)
© The Trustees of the British Museum. All rights reserved

properties.Title: Reproduction of a Minoan Bull Head Rhyton
properties.Description:
Reproduction of a Minoan Bull Head Rhyton
Early 20th century (reproduction of ca. 1625-1470 BCE original)
Polychrome plaster
Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of Mrs. Schuyler Van Rensselaer, 1926.32.3
